subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|ic}} of two {{zh-l|*人|person}}, one upright ({{zh-l|*亻}}) and one upside down ({{zh-l|*𠤎}}) — reversal; change. ''{{w|Shuowen}}'' also considers {{zh-l|*𠤎}} to be a phonetic component.

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
{{rel-top3|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|化ける|ばける}}: appear in disguise
* {{ja-r|化け物|ばけもの}}: goblin, apparition
* {{ja-r|化かす|ばかす}}: bewitch, confuse
* {{ja-r|化%育|か%いく}}: evolution, growth
* {{ja-r|化%学|か%がく}}: chemistry
* {{ja-r|化%合|か%ごう}}: chemical combination
* {{ja-r|化%身|け%しん}}: {{q|Buddhist}} incarnation
* {{ja-r|化%粧|け%しょう}}: makeup, cosmetics
* {{ja-r|化%成|か%せい}}: change, transformation
* {{ja-r|化%生|か%せい}}: growth, metamorphosis
* {{ja-r|化%石|か%せき}}: fossil, petrifaction
* {{ja-r|化%繊|か%せん}}: synthetic fiber
* {{ja-r|化%膿|か%のう}}: suppuration, festering
* {{ja-r|悪%化|あっ%か}}: deterioration, aggravation
* {{ja-r|液%化|えき%か}}: liquefaction
* {{ja-r|塩%化|えん%か}}: chloride
* {{ja-r|欧%化|おう%か}}: Europeanization, westernization
* {{ja-r|感%化|かん%か}}: influence, inspiration
* {{ja-r|帰%化|き%か}}: naturalization
* {{ja-r|気%化|き%か}}: vaporization
* {{ja-r|強%化|きょう%か}}: strengthen, intensify
* {{ja-r|教%化|きょう%か}}: culture, education
* {{ja-r|激%化|げき%か}}, {{ja-r|激%化|げっ%か}}: intensification, aggravation
{{rel-mid3}}
* {{ja-r|硬%化|こう%か}}: [[hardening]]; [[sclerosis]]
* {{ja-r|固%化|こ%か}}: solidification
* {{ja-r|権%化|ごん%げ}}: incarnation, avatar
* {{ja-r|酸%化|さん%か}}: oxidation
* {{ja-r|消%化|しょう%か}}: digestion
* {{ja-r|進%化|しん%か}}: evolution, progress
* {{ja-r|浄%化|じょう%か}}: purification, cleanup
* {{ja-r|造%化|ぞう%か}}: the Creator, the Universe
* {{ja-r|電%化|でん%か}}: electrification
* {{ja-r|同%化|どう%か}}: assimilation, absorption
* {{ja-r|鈍%化|どん%か}}: becoming dull
* {{ja-r|軟%化|なん%か}}: softening, mollification
* {{ja-r|砒%化|ひ%か}}: [[arsenication]]
* {{ja-r|美%化|び%か}}: beautification, glorification
* {{ja-r|文%化|ぶん%か}}: culture, civilization
* {{ja-r|分%化|ぶん%か}}: specialization
* {{ja-r|変%化|へん%か}}: change, variation
* {{ja-r|変%化|へん%げ}}: goblin, ghost
* {{ja-r|緑%化|りょっ%か}}: tree planting
* {{ja-r|劣%化|れっ%か}}: deterioration, degradation
* {{ja-r|老%化|ろう%か}}: aging, senile deterioration
* {{ja-r|グローバル化|グローバルか}}: globalization
{{rel-mid3}}
* {{ja-r|コンピュータ化|コンピュータか}}: computerization
* {{ja-r|お化け|おばけ}}, {{ja-r|御%化け|お%ばけ}}: goblin, apparition
* {{ja-r|一%元%化|いち%げん%か}}: unification, centralization
* {{ja-r|機%械%化|き%かい%か}}: mechanization, computerization
* {{ja-r|近%代%化|きん%だい%か}}: modernization
* {{ja-r|具%体%化|ぐ%たい%か}}: embodiment
* {{ja-r|国%際%化|こく%さい%か}}: internationalization
* {{ja-r|合%理%化|ごう%り%か}}: rationalization
* {{ja-r|深%刻%化|しん%こく%か}}: becoming more serious
* {{ja-r|自%由%化|じ%ゆう%か}}: liberalization
* {{ja-r|正%常%化|せい%じょう%か}}: normalization
* {{ja-r|多%様%化|た%よう%か}}: diversification
* {{ja-r|本%格%化|ほん%かく%か}}: regularization
* {{ja-r|民%営%化|みん%えい%か}}: privatization
* {{ja-r|明%文%化|めい%ぶん%か}}: stipulate
* {{ja-r|自%動%化|じ%どう%か}}: automation
* {{ja-r|誤%魔%化す|ご%ま%かす}}: deceive, falsify
* {{ja-r|情%報%化|じょう%ほう%か}}: [[informatization]]
* {{ja-r|硫%化|りゅう%か}}: [[sulfuration]]
{{rel-bottom}}

subSections.text:
